page.title: 14WILLIS' GARAGE
page.content: The garage is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Derek Willis. The property covers just over one acre of land and comprises of 2 large garages and a bungalow. The buildings were constructed especially for the Willis family 18 years ago. They own 10 buses and carry about 400 school children each day. The drivers have six regular routes each day. There are two full-time and one part-time mechanics employed, mainly for the repair of commercial vehicles. In the house, they have a valuble collection of over 1000 model Dinky toys.
